result.eng: She was lying on the ground.
result.ga: bhí sí ina luí ar an talamh
result.orig: Bhí sí ina luí ar an talamh
result.html: bhí sí ina luí ar an talamhShe was lying on the ground.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sí ina luí ar an talaṁShe was lying on the ground.

result.eng: At sea or on land?
result.ga: ar farraige nó ar talamh
result.orig: Ar farraige nó ar talamh
result.html: ar farraige nó ar talamhAt sea or on land?
result.ponchtml: ar farraige nó ar talaṁAt sea or on land?

result.eng: In heaven and on earth.
result.ga: ar neamh is ar talamh
result.orig: Ar neamh is ar talamh
result.html: ar neamh is ar talamhIn heaven and on earth.
result.ponchtml: ar neaṁ is ar talaṁIn heaven and on earth.

result.eng: They are on American soil now.
result.ga: tá siad ar thalamh mheiriceá anois
result.orig: Tá siad ar thalamh Mheiriceá anois
result.html: tá siad ar thalamh mheiriceá anoisThey are on American soil now.
result.ponchtml: tá siad ar ṫalaṁ ṁeiriceá anoisThey are on American soil now.

result.eng: They would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ga: bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.orig: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.html: bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálachThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ponchtml: ḃainidís díoltas amaċ ar úinéirí talún a ḃí cruálaċThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.orig: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.html: bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an bád ag druidim isteaċ sa ċé agus sul i ḃfad ḃí siad ar ṫalaṁ tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.

result.eng: An underground train is called metro.
result.ga: cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamh
result.orig: Cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamh
result.html: cuirtear meitreo ar thraein faoi thalamhAn underground train is called metro.
result.ponchtml: cuirtear meitreo ar ṫraein faoi ṫalaṁAn underground train is called metro.

result.eng: People who take my loyalty for granted.
result.ga: daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseacht
result.orig: Daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseacht
result.html: daoine a dhéanann talamh slán de mo dhílseachtPeople who take my loyalty for granted.
result.ponchtml: daoine a ḋéanann talaṁ slán de mo ḋílseaċtPeople who take my loyalty for granted.

result.eng: He paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ga: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.orig: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.html: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ponchtml: d'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.

result.eng: He is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ga: is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.orig: Is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talún
result.html: is eisean an duine is saibhre ar dhroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.
result.ponchtml: is eisean an duine is saiḃre ar ḋroim na talúnHe is the richest person on the face of the earth.

result.eng: Our life on earth is temporary.
result.ga: is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.orig: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.html: is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamhOur life on earth is temporary.
result.ponchtml: is neaṁḃuan ár mbeaṫa ar talaṁOur life on earth is temporary.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: Do not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ga: ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.orig: Ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh sí
result.html: ná déan talamh slán de go dtiocfaidh síDo not take it for granted that she will come.
result.ponchtml: ná déan talaṁ slán de go dtiocfaiḋ síDo not take it for granted that she will come.

result.eng: She didn't take anything for granted.
result.ga: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.orig: Ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.html: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bithShe didn't take anything for granted.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋearna sí talaṁ slán de rud ar biṫShe didn't take anything for granted.

result.eng: He fell to the ground.
result.ga: thit sé go talamh
result.orig: Thit sé go talamh
result.html: thit sé go talamhHe fell to the ground.
result.ponchtml: ṫit sé go talaṁHe fell to the ground.

result.eng: The aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ga: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.orig: Thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimp
result.html: thuirling an t-eitleán ar thalamh de phlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.
result.ponchtml: ṫuirling an t-eitleán ar ṫalaṁ de ṗlimpThe aerplane suddenly landed on the ground.

result.eng: They are scheming something!
result.ga: tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.orig: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.html: tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!
result.ponchtml: tá uisce faoi ṫalaṁ éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.orig: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.html: mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ponchtml: mar ċuid den uisce faoi ṫalaṁ lofa seo cuireaḋ an prionsa i dteaċ na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.orig: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
result.html: thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ponchtml: ṫit an foirgneaṁ go talaṁ gan ċoinne i ndeireaḋ tráṫnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: anseo i nua-eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.html: anseo i nua-eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ponchtml: anseo i nua-eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: As soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ga: ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.orig: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua

result.ponchtml: ar fáil amaċ do na cóilíniġ go raiḃ talaṁ ṁaiṫ sa doṁan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.

result.eng: He was six foot tall.
result.ga: bhí sé sé troithe ó thalamh
result.orig: Bhí sé sé troithe ó thalamh
result.html: bhí sé sé troithe ó thalamhHe was six foot tall.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé sé troiṫe ó ṫalaṁHe was six foot tall.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ga: rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.orig: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.html: rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ponchtml: rinne siad amaċ fanaċt ar an talaṁ tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
